Was mother born with any birth defects? Is this the patients first pregnancy? Number of Previous Pregnancies Number of Living Children Number of Low Weight Births (>2.5kg) Number of Stillborns Number of Miscarriages Number of C-Sections Number of Postpartum Hemorrhages Number of Pregnancy Infections Other Medical History Comments Number of High Blood Pressure Pregnancies
How many days does the patient exercise per week?

//Strings For New Patient Input Headers and Conditional TextView Questions Personal Medical History: What day did the patients last menstrual cycle begin? What birth defect(s) was the mother born with? Is this the patients first pregnancy? Other Personal Medical History Questions: Lifestyle Questions: Has the patient consumed alcohol during the pregnancy? How many drinks does the patient consume per week? Does the patient smoke tobacco or use nicotine-containing products? How many cigarettes or nicotine-containing products does the patient use per day. Does the patient use any recreational drugs What types of drugs does the patient use?
// Random Strings: Create Patient Profile
